title: 关于1.14的盔甲架
author: Dialog
txt_content:
1.14.X的悬浮字我不会移除
然后怎么可以在1.14.X版本弄悬浮字啊??

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Teenager_Yang 于 2019-7-23 22:25 编辑 

清除浮空字：尽可能站得离浮空字近，然后玩家聊天栏输入并运行：/kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,distance=..2]复制代码意思是杀死2格以内所有的盔甲架，2可以改成更小的数字（避免误伤），前提是你站得离浮空字足够得近。
生成浮空字（看，我的答案比沙发的简洁）：/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,Marker:1b,CustomName:'{"text":"浮空字"}',CustomNameVisible:1b}复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2019-7-21 22:48 编辑 

清除就 /kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,distance=..5]

你身边5格内的盔甲架

弄的话
/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {PersistenceRequired:1b,DisabledSlots:2039583,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b,CustomName:"{\"text\":\"这是字\"}",CustomNameVisible:1b}

奇怪，怎么套上 code 就丢掉了 \


/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {PersistenceRequired:1b,DisabledSlots:2039583,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b,CustomName:"{"text":"这是字"}",CustomNameVisible:1b}
复制代码
